about_the_game:
In this Cycling Pack, get cycling kits and differentiate yourself from other teams in the peloton, but also from other players in multiplayer. This DLC includes:
- Two complete cycling kits, including jerseys, shorts, gloves, shoes and socks in the colors of the GogoBank and Krespa teams.
detailed_description:
In this Cycling Pack, get cycling kits and differentiate yourself from other teams in the peloton, but also from other players in multiplayer. This DLC includes:
- Two complete cycling kits, including jerseys, shorts, gloves, shoes and socks in the colors of the GogoBank and Krespa teams.
